name: 32 World
description:
32 World is a number puzzle game inspired by o:anquan. There are 5 possible numbers, they are 2, 4, 8, 16 and 32. Each time you reduce numbers by merging, meanwhile you may create new obstacles if 32 is merged into. Because 32 can not be moved but only be killed by a newly merged 32 next to it.

Try to survive as long as possible.

Controls

  • Drag a number(except 32) to a tile with the same number to merge them.
  • You can continue to drag the newly merged number (keep pressing) to the adjacent tile with the same number.
  • Once 32 is generated, it kills other 32 next to it.
  • Remember to keep at least 2 empty tiles to survive!

Tech

  • Game engine : none
  • Code lines: <400
